mapper.select: SELECT u.*, c.lastMessage, c.lastReceiveTime, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(u.contactId, 1, 1) = 'G' THEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM userContact uc WHERE u.contactId = uc.contactId) ELSE 0 END AS MemberCount FROM ChatSessionUser u LEFT JOIN ChatSession c ON c.sessionId = u.sessionId WHERE u.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY c.lastReceiveTime DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ChatSessionUser (userId, contactId, sessionId,contactName) VALUES
(#{item.userId},#{item.contactId}, #{item.sessionId},#{item.contactName})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sessionId = VALUES(sessionId), contactName = VALUES(contactName)
